statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSRole) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSRole)-[r:TRUSTS_AWS_PRINCIPAL]->(:AWSPrincipal) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
